EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: This Skill is also considered a [#5299DC]Spell[], and will grant one stack of [#5299DC]Power[].
This Skill is also considered an [#FF5252]Arte[], and will grant one stack of [#FF5252]Poise[].
This Attack is also considered a [#5299DC]Spell[], and will grant one stack of [#5299DC]Power[].
This Attack is also considered an [#FF5252]Arte[], and will grant one stack of [#FF5252]Poise[].
Has an additional effect if you have a stack of [#5299DC]Power[].
Has an additional effect if you have a stack of [#FF5252]Poise[].

mysticmod:AcidSplash.NAME: Acid Splash
mysticmod:AcidSplash.DESCRIPTION: mysticmod:Cantrip. NL Deal !D! damage. Draw a card.

mysticmod:Alacrity.NAME: Alacrity
mysticmod:Alacrity.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL [#FF5252]Poised[]: Gain [E] next turn.

mysticmod:AllIn.NAME: All In
mysticmod:AllIn.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Become Weak for !M! turns. Weak amount is reduced for each stack of [#5299DC]Power[].

mysticmod:ArcaneDodge.NAME: Arcane Dodge
mysticmod:ArcaneDodge.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL [#5299DC]Powerful[]: Gain an additional !M! Block.

mysticmod:BladeBurst.NAME: Blade Burst
mysticmod:BladeBurst.DESCRIPTION: Lose !M! Strength. Deal !D! damage. Add a *Magic *Weapon to your discard pile. NL Exhaust.
mysticmod:BladeBurst.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Lose !M! Strength. Deal !D! damage. Add a *Magic *Weapon+ to your discard pile. NL Exhaust.

mysticmod:BladeMaster.NAME: Blade Master
mysticmod:BladeMaster.DESCRIPTION: Return up to !M! [#FF5252]Artes[] from your discard pile to your hand.

mysticmod:BulkUp.NAME: Bulk Up
mysticmod:BulkUp.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block, then Exhaust a random card in your hand. NL [#5299DC]Powerful[]: Choose if and what to Exhaust.

mysticmod:ChargedParry.NAME: Charged Parry
mysticmod:ChargedParry.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL [#5299DC]Powerful[]: Gain !M! Strength this turn.

mysticmod:ClosingBarrage.NAME: Closing Barrage
mysticmod:ClosingBarrage.DESCRIPTION: Deals Y damage X times, where Y is equal to your total [#5299DC]Power[] and [#FF5252]Poise[] multiplied by !M!.
mysticmod:ClosingBarrage.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deals Y damage X+1 times, where Y is equal to your total [#5299DC]Power[] and [#FF5252]Poise[] multiplied by !M!.

mysticmod:ComboCaster.NAME: Combo Caster
mysticmod:ComboCaster.DESCRIPTION: At the start of each turn, add a random mysticmod:Cantrip to your hand and draw 1 less card.

mysticmod:ComponentsPouch.NAME: Components Pouch
mysticmod:ComponentsPouch.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage, then deal !D! damage for each [#5299DC]Spell[] in your hand. NL For !M! turns, all Defends count as [#5299DC]Spells[].

mysticmod:CorrosiveTouch.NAME: Corrosive Touch
mysticmod:CorrosiveTouch.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Begin next turn with one [#5299DC]Power[].

mysticmod:Dedication.NAME: Dedication
mysticmod:Dedication.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! Strength and Dexterity. NL Can be upgraded any number of times.

mysticmod:Disengage.NAME: Disengage
mysticmod:Disengage.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Begin next turn with one [#FF5252]Poise[].

mysticmod:DiviningBlow.NAME: Divining Blow
mysticmod:DiviningBlow.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL [#5299DC]Powerful[]: Draw 1 card for each stack of [#5299DC]Power[].

mysticmod:Doublecast.NAME: Doublecast
mysticmod:Doublecast.DESCRIPTION: This turn, your next [#5299DC]Spell[] is played twice.
mysticmod:Doublecast.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: This turn, your next two [#5299DC]Spells[] are played twice.

mysticmod:EarthenWall.NAME: Earthen Wall
mysticmod:EarthenWall.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. Gain !M! Dexterity this turn.

mysticmod:EbbAndFlow.NAME: Ebb and Flow
mysticmod:EbbAndFlow.DESCRIPTION: Each turn, draw 1 card, then discard 1 card unless you have a [#5299DC]Spell[] and 1 card unless you have an [#FF5252]Arte[].
mysticmod:EbbAndFlow.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL Each turn, draw 1 card, then discard 1 card unless you have a [#5299DC]Spell[] and 1 card unless you have an [#FF5252]Arte[].

mysticmod:EnchantedMoulinet.NAME: Enchanted Moulinet
mysticmod:EnchantedMoulinet.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies. For each enemy that dies, gain [E] .

mysticmod:EnergizedRift.NAME: Energized Rift
mysticmod:EnergizedRift.DESCRIPTION: [#FF5252]Poised[]: Add a random mysticmod:Cantrip to your draw pile for each stack of [#FF5252]Poise[]. NL Exhaust.
mysticmod:EnergizedRift.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: [#FF5252]Poised[]: Add a random Upgraded mysticmod:Cantrip to your draw pile for each stack of [#FF5252]Poise[]. NL Exhaust.

mysticmod:Feint.NAME: Feint
mysticmod:Feint.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. Add a random mysticmod:Cantrip to your draw pile.
mysticmod:Feint.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. Add a random Upgraded mysticmod:Cantrip to your draw pile.

mysticmod:Fireball.NAME: Fireball
mysticmod:Fireball.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL [#FF5252]Poised[]: Deal it to ALL enemies.

mysticmod:FiveFootStep.NAME: 5 Foot Step
mysticmod:FiveFootStep.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL [#5299DC]Powerful[]: Shuffle this card into your draw pile.

mysticmod:FloatingDisk.NAME: Floating Disk
mysticmod:FloatingDisk.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL [#FF5252]Poised[]: Gain !M! Dexterity. Exhaust.

mysticmod:Flourish.NAME: Flourish
mysticmod:Flourish.DESCRIPTION: Costs [E] less for each stack of [#5299DC]Power[] and [#FF5252]Poise[]. Deal !D! damage twice, then double the [#5299DC]Power[] and [#FF5252]Poise[] amounts.

mysticmod:Flurry.NAME: Flurry
mysticmod:Flurry.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage !M! times. NL [#5299DC]Powerful[]: !mysticmod:M2! times instead

mysticmod:Fly.NAME: Fly
mysticmod:Fly.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL [#FF5252]Poised[]: Block is not removed at the start of your next turn.

mysticmod:GeminiForm.NAME: Gemini Form
mysticmod:GeminiForm.DESCRIPTION: For the first [#5299DC]Spell[] and [#FF5252]Arte[] you play each turn, play a random card of the other type from your draw pile. NL Ethereal.
mysticmod:GeminiForm.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: For the first [#5299DC]Spell[] and [#FF5252]Arte[] you play each turn, play a random card of the other type from your draw pile.

mysticmod:Grapple.NAME: Grapple
mysticmod:Grapple.DESCRIPTION: Stun the target. Can't use the same turn as an Attack. NL Ethereal. Exhaust.
mysticmod:Grapple.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Stun the target. Can't use the same turn as an Attack. NL Exhaust.

mysticmod:Grease.NAME: Grease
mysticmod:Grease.DESCRIPTION: Target enemy loses !M! Strength this turn. NL [#FF5252]Poised[]: ALL enemies instead.

mysticmod:GreaterInvisibility.NAME: Greater Invisibility
mysticmod:GreaterInvisibility.DESCRIPTION: Gain 1 Intangible. NL Exhaust, Ethereal. NL [#FF5252]Poised[]: Does not Exhaust if you have at least !M! [#FF5252]Poise[].
mysticmod:GreaterInvisibility.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain 1 Intangible. NL Exhaust, Ethereal. NL [#FF5252]Poised[]: Does not Exhaust.

mysticmod:IllusionOfCalm.NAME: Illusion Of Calm
mysticmod:IllusionOfCalm.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Become Frail for !M! turns. Frail amount is reduced for each stack of [#FF5252]Poise[].

mysticmod:Haste.NAME: Haste
mysticmod:Haste.DESCRIPTION: For X turns, draw 1 card, gain [E] , deal 1 more damage with your attacks, and gain 1 more Block from your cards.
mysticmod:Haste.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: For X+1 turns, draw 1 card, gain [E] , deal 1 more damage with your attacks, and gain 1 more Block from your cards.

mysticmod:HeavyStrike.NAME: Heavy Strike
mysticmod:HeavyStrike.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL [#5299DC]Powerful[]: Increase this card's damage by !M! permanently. NL Exhaust.

mysticmod:HunkerDown.NAME: Hunker Down
mysticmod:HunkerDown.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! Dexterity until the end of the turn.

mysticmod:KnowledgePool.NAME: Knowledge Pool
mysticmod:KnowledgePool.DESCRIPTION: Choose one of 3 random [#5299DC]Spell[] cards and add it to your hand. it costs 0 this turn. NL Exhaust.

mysticmod:LightningBolt.NAME: Lightning Bolt
mysticmod:LightningBolt.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies. NL [#FF5252]Poised[]: Deal !M! damage instead.

mysticmod:Lunge.NAME: Lunge
mysticmod:Lunge.DESCRIPTION: Gain [E] [E]. NL Draw 2 cards. NL Lose 4 Dexterity this turn. NL Exhaust. mysticmod:Feat.
mysticmod:Lunge.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain [E] [E] [E]. NL Draw 2 cards. NL Lose 4 Dexterity this turn. NL Exhaust. mysticmod:Feat.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: I have already played an [#FF5252]Arte[] this turn!

mysticmod:MagicMissile.NAME: Magic Missile
mysticmod:MagicMissile.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage for each time the deck was shuffled this combat.
mysticmod:MagicMissile.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage for each time the deck was shuffled this combat, and for each stack of [#FF5252]Poise[].

mysticmod:MagicWeapon.NAME: Magic Weapon
mysticmod:MagicWeapon.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! Strength. Add a *Blade *Burst to your discard pile. NL Exhaust.
mysticmod:MagicWeapon.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! Strength. Add a *Blade *Burst+ to your discard pile. NL Exhaust.

mysticmod:MirrorEntity.NAME: Mirror Entity
mysticmod:MirrorEntity.DESCRIPTION: [#5299DC]Spells[] and [#FF5252]Artes[] also advance next turn's [#5299DC]Power[] and [#FF5252]Poise[] counters.

mysticmod:MirrorStrike.NAME: Mirror Strike
mysticmod:MirrorStrike.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL [#5299DC]Powerful[]: For every two stacks of [#5299DC]Power[], deal another !D! damage.

mysticmod:Momentum.NAME: Momentum
mysticmod:Momentum.DESCRIPTION: [#5299DC]Spells[] and [#FF5252]Artes[] deal more damage and gain more Block for each stack of [#FF5252]Poise[] or [#5299DC]Power[] respectively.

mysticmod:MysticalShield.NAME: Mystical Shield
mysticmod:MysticalShield.DESCRIPTION: Block is reduced to 8 instead of 0 at the start of your turn.
mysticmod:MysticalShield.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Block is set to 8 instead of 0 at the start of your turn.

mysticmod:Natural20.NAME: Natural 20
mysticmod:Natural20.DESCRIPTION: Your next Attack this turn does double damage. NL Exhaust.
mysticmod:Natural20.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Your next Attack this turn does double damage.

mysticmod:ObscuringMist.NAME: Obscuring Mist
mysticmod:ObscuringMist.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL [#FF5252]Poised[]: Gain !M! Artifact. NL Exhaust.

mysticmod:PowerAttack.NAME: Power Attack
mysticmod:PowerAttack.DESCRIPTION: Gain !mysticmod:M2! Strength and lose !M! Dexterity this turn. NL mysticmod:Feat.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: I have already played an [#FF5252]Arte[] this turn!

mysticmod:PowerSlash.NAME: Power Slash
mysticmod:PowerSlash.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Gain an additional stack of [#FF5252]Poise[].

mysticmod:PreparedCaster.DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL Choose one [#5299DC]Spell[] from your draw pile and add it to your hand. NL Exhaust.

mysticmod:Prestidigitation.NAME: Prestidigitation
mysticmod:Prestidigitation.DESCRIPTION: mysticmod:Cantrip. NL Gain !B! Block. Draw a card.

mysticmod:Probe.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Begin next turn with one [#FF5252]Poise[].

mysticmod:PunishingArmor.NAME: Punishing Armor
mysticmod:PunishingArmor.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL [#FF5252]Poised[]: Gain !M! Thorns. NL Exhaust.

mysticmod:PureInstinct.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block, then gain !B! Block for each [#FF5252]Arte[] in your hand. NL For !M! turns, all Strikes count as [#FF5252]Artes[].

mysticmod:RapidCaster.NAME: Rapid Caster
mysticmod:RapidCaster.DESCRIPTION: The first mysticmod:Cantrip you play each turn is played twice.
mysticmod:RapidCaster.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL The first mysticmod:Cantrip you play each turn is played twice.

mysticmod:RayOfFrost.NAME: Ray Of Frost
mysticmod:RayOfFrost.DESCRIPTION: mysticmod:Cantrip. NL Deal !D! damage. Gain !B! Block. Draw a card.

mysticmod:Riposte.NAME: Riposte

mysticmod:Snowball.NAME: Snowball
mysticmod:Snowball.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Gain an additional stack of [#5299DC]Power[].

mysticmod:Spark.NAME: Spark
mysticmod:Spark.DESCRIPTION: mysticmod:Cantrip. NL Draw a card, then gain [E] if the card is a [#5299DC]Spell[] or an [#FF5252]Arte[]. NL Exhaust.
mysticmod:Spark.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: mysticmod:Cantrip. NL Draw a card, then gain [E] if the card is a [#5299DC]Spell[] or an [#FF5252]Arte[].

mysticmod:SpellCombat.NAME: Spell Combat
mysticmod:SpellCombat.DESCRIPTION: [#5299DC]Powerful[]: Deal !D! damage X times. NL [#FF5252]Poised[]: Gain !B! Block X times.

mysticmod:SpellRecall.DESCRIPTION: Return a [#5299DC]Spell[] from your discard pile to your hand. NL Exhaust.
mysticmod:SpellRecall.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Return a [#5299DC]Spell[] from your discard pile to your hand.

mysticmod:Spellstrike.NAME: Spellstrike
mysticmod:Spellstrike.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Search your draw pile for an Attack [#5299DC]Spell[] and play it. NL Exhaust.
mysticmod:Spellstrike.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Search your draw pile for an Attack [#5299DC]Spell[] and play it.

mysticmod:SpontaneousCaster.NAME: Spontaneous Caster
mysticmod:SpontaneousCaster.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you play a [#5299DC]Spell[], exhaust it and add a random [#5299DC]Spell[] to your discard pile. NL All [#5299DC]Spells'[] costs are reduced to [E] .
mysticmod:SpontaneousCaster.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL Whenever you play a [#5299DC]Spell[], exhaust it and add a random [#5299DC]Spell[] to your discard pile. NL All [#5299DC]Spells'[] costs are reduced to [E] .

mysticmod:Shield.NAME: Shield

mysticmod:ShockingGrasp.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL [#FF5252]Poised[]: Deal !M! damage instead.

mysticmod:Stoneskin.NAME: Stoneskin
mysticmod:Stoneskin.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Gain mysticmod:Stoneskin for !M! turns.

mysticmod:StyleChange.NAME: Style Change
mysticmod:StyleChange.DESCRIPTION: Add a random [#FF5252]Arte[] to your hand. It costs 0 this turn. NL Exhaust.

mysticmod:SuddenClarity.NAME: Sudden Clarity
mysticmod:SuddenClarity.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Draw a card.

My Fox companion is asleep right now. Please re-enable FriendlyMinions!
